availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Lawrenceburg, Anderson County, Kentucky. A farmer. Born in Fayette County, Kentucky, son of William Hedges and Nancy Hardesty.

bibl.p: "Charles H. Hedges," Louisville Courier-Journal, 21 May 1912, 7. ProQuest Historical Newspapers: Louisville Courier-Journal (1830-1922).
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Lawrenceburg post office, p. 71.
*Kentucky Death Records (1852-1964)_, KDLA, Roll #7016143, Jefferson County, 19 May 1912, State File #12865.
